mapper.select: SELECT T.go_cd, T.go_ko, B.icd, B.icd_name, B.icd_eng, C.pre_cd, C.pre_detail, C.injc_pth_nm, C.unit, C.pay_tp_nm, D.sym_cd, D.sym_detail FROM GROUP_ORDER T LEFT OUTER JOIN DISEASE_GO B ON (T.GO_CD = B.GO_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRESCRIPTION_GO C ON (T.GO_CD = C.GO_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYMPTOM_GO D ON (T.GO_CD = D.GO_CD)

SELECT T.go_cd, T.go_ko, B.icd, B.icd_name, B.icd_eng, C.pre_cd, C.pre_detail, C.injc_pth_nm, C.unit, C.pay_tp_nm, D.sym_cd, D.sym_detail FROM GROUP_ORDER T LEFT OUTER JOIN DISEASE_GO B ON (T.GO_CD = B.GO_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRESCRIPTION_GO C ON (T.GO_CD = C.GO_CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYMPTOM_GO D ON (T.GO_CD = D.GO_CD) WHERE T.go_cd = #{goCd}
